name: css-z-index
description: Css module of single purpose classes for z index

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-z-index.css > css/css-z-index.css && tachyons src/css-z-index.css --minify > css/css-z-index.min.css && tachyons src/css-z-index.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
